title: The Vampire Diaries: Dark Reunion (The Vampire Diaries #4)

A source of power has infiltrated Fells Church, putting its inhabitants in danger. Not knowing what to do, Meredith, Matt, and Bonnie use a summoning spell to call for Stefan and Damon â€” but whose side is Damon on? This novel greatly expands Bonnie and Meredith as characters. They concoct a plan and lure Tyler into the graveyard. After threatening him, Tyler reveals startling information about the killer.......
